item.description:
Tuesday, April 26th 7 PM ~ Book Signing and Lecture at Caring Hands, Haverhill, MA
Lecture info - Lessons From a Psychic Medium, Finding the Value in Life
Isabeau covers various perspectives on the topics of self-empowerment, awareness, living naturally, reducing stress, trust, and fear.  Isabeau will bring her knowledge of psychic experiences and share with you the keys to using your intuition and inherent psychic abilities to live a more fulfilling life.  A question and answer session and book signing will follow. 
Caring Hands ~ 55 Wingate Street, Haverhill, MA 01832 ~ (978)994-3188
Registration not required ~ Cost - $10 suggested donation
item.why: Free lecture with suggested donation and book signing with Cracking Open author, Isabeau Esby
item.name: Book Signing & Lecture, Lessons From a Psychic Medium, Finding the Value in Life
